name: Chamber Designer
description:
Welcome to the Chamber Designer Tool!

Your mission is to reproduce client's ideas for the one and only room, that he/she dreams about. Room ideas are in different shapes and to score points, you need to reproduce them as close as you can. And remember, there is a time limit to acomplish it.

Use mouse for controls:
- LMB for moving edges
- RMB for adding verticles

Game contains also Free Mode, which allows to build some shapes without time limit.

Practice Mode not finished, so it will be included in Post-LD version of the game.

Linux and Mac versions aren't tested out, so in case of them not working, please let us know. Please, report also any found bugs.

We had a lot of fun doing the game and we are pretty proud of the result.

What we used:
- GODOT engine for programming
- Krita for graphics

Credits for fonts and music will be added soon.

The game was developed by team Palys Plays for Ludum Dare 37:
- Tomasz Pałys
- Natalia Potoczny
